Text.val: Author: Stephan Huppertz
Created: 22.11.2010 (SCR15820) --> Re-designed program
21.03.2014 SH SCR18789 Part3 Added test GNRL_MARKCODMAXCOMMEXCEEDED to built client balance
21.11.2012 SH SCR17544 Built separate task to fetch max(DEBC_MAXCONCENTRATION) for concentration
12.11.2012 SH SCR17544 Initializations: Added module 'Set values multiple debtor client for the same DEBH'
29.10.2012 SH SCR17544 Changed order by in task "ObtainDEBC(Legal/Concentration" to select max(DEBC_MAXCONCENTRATION)
27.04.2012 SH SCR17283 Extended test if concentration is not allowed with CLNT408_MAXCONCENTRATIONTYPE = 5
05.03.2012 SH SCR17180 Part1 Fixed problem with test on DEBC_DEBH = V.DEBHNO in part
"Set values concentration debtor client (main client)" --> DEBC_DEBH was used instead V.DEBHNO
16.11.2011 SH SCR16880 Part3 Added test GNRL_MARKCODLIMDENIED to built client balance
18.04.2011 JOH SCR16306 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY
and GB002 by GB902
29.11.2010 SH SCR16027 Added DEBC_CONGROUP_DEBC_NO tests
-- Part 2 Calculation of the debtor balance:
-- Part 3 - Calculation of the client balance:
-- Part 4 - Calculation of the maximum and exceeded concentration:
-- Set the output parameters
-- Set general variables
... set values legal owner debtor client
... set values multiple debtor client for the same DEBH
... use values from debtor of main concentration client
-- Retreive client values
... retreive main (conentration) client values
-- Not allowed for confidential / Intercredit clients on miscelaneous debtors
... also not allowed if ....
-- 1. Calculate the current balance of factoring account and special account
-- 2. Calculate the sum of all changes that are not applied yet in the client
-- 3. Calculate client balance
-- Final calcualtion
Type 4 Legal collection

ExpSyntax.val: 'and (CMCD_MARKCODE='&Str ({1,35},'3')&' or CMCD_MARKCODE='&Str ({1,36},'3')&' or CMCD_MARKCODE='&Str ({1,39},'3')&' or CMCD_MARKCODE='&Str ({1,40},'3')&')'

SQL_STMT_U.val: select CMON_CURRENCY, cast(sum(CMON_CURRBALFACTACC) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(CMON_CURRBALSPECIALACC) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/CMON, :1/CLNT where CMON_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and CLNT107_CONC_ADMNO = :2 and CMON_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and CLNT107_CONC_CLNTNO = :3 and CMON_YEAR = :4 and CMON_MONTH = :5 and CMON_CURRENCY = CLNT108_ACC_CURR group by CMON_CURRENCY for fetch only

select CLNT108_ACC_CURR, cast( sum( CMCD_SPECIALACCOUNTC) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/CMCD, :1/CLNT where CMCD_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and CLNT107_CONC_ADMNO = :2 and CMCD_CLNTNO= CLNT102_CLNTNO and CLNT107_CONC_CLNTNO = :3 :4 group by CLNT108_ACC_CURR for fetch only

Select CLNT108_ACC_CURR, cast( sum(ACCC_MUTAFACTORING) as decimal (13,2)), cast( sum(ACCC_MUTASPECIAL) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/ACCC, :1/CLNT where ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and CLNT107_CONC_ADMNO = :2 and ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and CLNT107_CONC_CLNTNO = :3 and ACCC_ACCT_DATE = ':4' and ACCC_MUTTYPE between 98 and 99 group by CLNT108_ACC_CURR for fetch only
select cast(sum(DEBB_ACTINVAFACACCH) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/DEBB, :1/DEBC where DEBB_DEBC_NO = DEBC_NO and DEBB_ACTINVAFACACCH <> 0 and DEBC_CONGROUP_DEBC_NO = :2 for fetch only
